entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
